official_title: Joint resolution to designate February 2, 1976, as Bilingual Founding Document Day.

summary.text: Designates February 2, 1976, the anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo, as Bilingual Founding Document Day.

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate February 2, 1976, as Bilingual Founding Document Day.
